solution_line_template: She got two fillings at a cost of {num_fillings} * ${cost_per_filling} = $<<{num_fillings}*{cost_per_filling}={fillings_cost}>>{fillings_cost}.
Thus, Wendy paid ${total_bill} - ${fillings_cost} - ${cleaning_cost} = $<<{total_bill}-{fillings_cost}-{cleaning_cost}={extraction_cost}>>{extraction_cost} for the tooth extraction.
